content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, e raised to the x power, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="e raised to the x power, times cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="negative e raised to the x power, times cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the x power, times, open parenthesis, sine x, plus, cosine x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the x power, times, open parenthesis, sine x, minus, cosine x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="e raised to the x power, times, open parenthesis, sine x, plus, cosine x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
